info.title: Be The Hero - Documentation
info.description: This is a sample server for standard APIs of the application!

contact.name: Leonardo Ronne - Product Manager at Visor Brasil

parameters.name: ngoID
parameters.description: NGO's ID, if not passed will list all NGOs

updated_at.description: Last time when NGO was updated

parameters.name: ngoID
parameters.description: NGO's ID, if not passed will delete all NGOs and NGO's incidents of the database

401.description: Password or JWT token are not valid

updated_at.description: Last time when NGO was updated

401.description: Password or JWT token are not valid or invalid password
Invalid credentials or NGO not verified

updated_at.description: Last time when NGO was updated

parameters.name: incident
parameters.description: Send a incident created by a NGO

parameters.name: ngoID
parameters.description: NGO's ID, if passed it will show all the NGO's incidents

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Limit results by 5 when ngoID is not informed, you need to increment the value by 1 to go to the next page. It won't work if you use it with ngoID!

DESCRIPTION.example: A flood destroyed all of our equipment
A flood destroyed all of our equipment

parameters.name: ID
parameters.description: Incident's ID to delete, if not passed it will delete all NGO's incidents

WHATSAPP.description: NGO's WhatsApp, it needs to have the country code (+XX) and the region code

PASSWORD.description: NGO's password, it must contain at least: 8 characters; a lowercase letter and a capital letter; a number; a special character

UF.description: NGO's UF, it must cointain only two letters and uppercase

DESCRIPTION.example: A flood destroyed all of our equipment
A flood destroyed all of our equipment
